text: my darling teresa i don't want you to
worry for i am well
writing this letter is dr james cortese
same as you bonehead who was kind enough
to waste his time on me
i've been in the war for a year now but
it feels like forever
there are no heroes here only men doing
their best to survive
we laugh together to stave off fear but
it still sneaks up
on us like a wolf it creeps into the
body like
gas i must kill this wolf before it
kills me
you are the reason i survive
there are days when i think of you and
of being back home
but sometimes merciless bombs make the
whole earth
shake if i could write about the ocean
[Music]
now all i see is endless land
every blast keeps me further away
always believe in our love
pray for me nothing else can save me now
i'll do all i can to get back home
i am always watching over you as your
handkerchief and our lady of
are watching over me
i kiss your hands yours forever anibal
[Music]
you
